-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"github.com/lu4p/binclude"
)

func main() {
	binclude.Include("./assets")

	anotherfile()

	infos, err := BinFS.ReadDir("./assets")
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	for _, info := range infos {
		println("Name:", info.Name())
	}
}

-- anotherfile.go --
package main

import (
	"io/ioutil"

	"github.com/lu4p/binclude"
)

func anotherfile() {
	binclude.Include("file.txt")

	f, err := BinFS.Open("file.txt")
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	out, err := ioutil.ReadAll(f)
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	println(string(out))
}
